fields.question: Which laptop brands do you sell?
fields.answer: We offer laptops from Dell, Lenovo, HP, and Apple, all at affordable prices and with a satisfaction guarantee.

fields.question: Are your laptops new or refurbished?
fields.answer: We offer only new and certified laptops.

fields.question: What does your guarantee cover?
fields.answer: Our guarantee covers manufacturing defects and hardware failures for a specified period after purchase. Details are included with each product.

fields.question: How do I know which laptop is right for me?
fields.answer: You can filter laptops by brand, price and processor to find the best fit for your needs.

fields.question: How do I place an order?
fields.answer: Simply select your laptop, add it to your cart, and proceed to checkout.

fields.question: What payment methods do you accept?
fields.answer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and other secure online payment options.

fields.question: Is my payment information secure?
fields.answer: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and processed through secure payment gateways.

fields.question: How long will it take to receive my order?
fields.answer: Delivery times vary by location and shipping method, but most orders are shipped within 3รป4 business days.

fields.question: Do you ship internationally?
fields.answer: Currently, we only ship within Europe. Please check our shipping policy for details.

fields.question: What is your return policy?
fields.answer: You may return your laptop within 15 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange, provided it is in its original condition.

fields.question: What do I do if I receive a defective product?
fields.answer: Contact us immediately. We will arrange a replacement or refund, depending on your preference.

fields.question: How do I contact customer support?
fields.answer: You can reach us via email, Our contact information is available on the About page.

fields.question: Do you offer technical support?
fields.answer: Yes, we provide technical support for all products sold on our website.
